我覺得唔洗咁general，prove到有一個x唔係0就得

Let f(x) = x - b sin x for x∈[0,pi]

f'(x) = 1 - b cos x
When f'(x) < 0, 0 < x < arccos (1/b)

Note that f(0) = 0. There exists a constant c∈( 0, arccos (1/b) ) such that f(c) < 0

f(pi) = pi > 0

By IVT, there exists a constant k∈(c, pi) such that f(k)=0
